Articles.Content:
How does this work as far as unlocking craft goes?

When you level up, you unlock a new plane(s), then you have to buy them into your hanger and train a crew

Username: 0jam3290

Favorite plane: Either the A-20 or the Hellcat(I'm still fairly low level, so I haven't been able to try many planes for myself yet).

I would love to play it, but my system sais LOL NOPE to the ground and causes a 50 FPS drop.

Might be just that my system is old.

I know that feeling. I love flight sims, but unfortunately this one is multiplayer-only, and I'm on a satellite connection with latency that could give a drunk sloth on a public holiday a run for its money.

That said, if I could, I'd totally download this game just to see if I could snipe a jet fighter out of the sky with a ground attack plane.

I know that feeling. I love flight sims, but unfortunately this one is multiplayer-only, and I'm on a satellite connection with latency that could give a drunk sloth on a public holiday a run for its money.

That said, if I could, I'd totally download this game just to see if I could snipe a jet fighter out of the sky with a ground attack plane.

NOPE! It'll also eventually include entire single player campaigns that you can either play on your own or co-op!

I started playing this a few days ago. My username is the same as on here.

As for my favorite plane, it's hard to say. So far the highest level fighter I've unlocked is the LaGG-3, which I can't say I'm entirely satisfied with, so I've been doing a lot of high-altitude bombing.

NOPE! It'll also eventually include entire single player campaigns that you can either play on your own or co-op!

Nice! I'll probably eventually buy it, then, either when that happens or when I get a faster Internet connection.

I'll probably eventually buy it

The game is actually free.

Edited May 27, 2013 by KevinW42
Huh. Well, that makes matters easier...

ok, I added a lot of people, have some question.

@satcharna: Is your username Sat2 or sat2? there is someone else having the same name as you.

@0jam3290: Can't find you? I tried searching for you but with no luck.

That is all, looking forward to seeing you all in the fight for air superiority.

[EDIT]

@Captain Kalawang: Same as 0jam, I can't find you when i search.

Edited May 27, 2013 by Manifest
Oh you won't see me, and if you do it won't be for long ;P
So... is it a good game worth downloading?

So... is it a good game worth downloading?

Yes. Yes it is.

Yes. Yes it is.

i think we can all agree on that

It's Sat2.

Looking forward to flying into your planes, y'all!
I would love to get this, but I can't get in to the beta testing. Oh well, I can just get it when it releases. It looks like so much fun!
it's an open beta though..
Yeah, you just sign up for an account on their site, and then download the client. There are no invitations required.
It just takes forever to download all the files, 4.5GB of them.
took me about an hour (fibre-optic broadband YEAH)
Perhaps its taking a while for me since I'm on the forums.
The Mac version doesn't have an open beta yet.

My username is the same: TheSuperintendnt. (I more or less always use that name.)

As far as planes go I've gotten the most kills with the P-39 Airacobra (both versions), and just unlocked the B-25(yet to fly it).

I love the Cat though, just soaks damage! WOW, my friends list got bigger! (I'm going to assume that Chobit = Chobit389.)

Edited May 27, 2013 by TheSuperintendnt
Yup, thats me! The Jap on your ass!~<3

In your A6M shooting jets.

I've registered and downloaded it now, and its so much fun. I've forgotten how much fun these games can be.

Username: LeonG17

Favourite aircraft: Still need to unlock some more but of my current ones: The Gladiator. Yep, I'm still on biplanes
